actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Astronautics
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Astronautics.

official_title: A bill to provide financial aid to local fire departments in the purchase of advanced firefighting equipment.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Commerce to make grants to local fire departments to pay up to one-half the cost of purchasing firefighting equipment. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide financial aid to local fire departments in the purchase of advanced firefighting equipment.
